subject: CROAT
title: Croatian Abroad
description: This immersion course provides students with an introduction to selected topics in Croatian-speaking environments. The topics range from history and culture, to language and linguistic varieties, as well as arts, architecture, and media landscapes. Course offerings include classes abroad as well as field trips. [Note: This course might incur additional costs for the student above the registration fee in the form of travel, room and board, and incidental costs. This is a repeatable course, subject to different content; it may be completed a total of two times.]
